sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; /* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ */ import { NewspaperIcon, PhoneIcon, SupportIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' const supportLinks = [ { name: 'React', href: '#', description: 'With React this portfolio is built on components which are dynamically rendered to the virtual DOM. The content you are reading is imported to the component from a JSON object.', icon: PhoneIcon, }, { name: 'React Router', href: '#', description: 'Varius facilisi mauris sed sit. Non sed et duis dui leo, vulputate id malesuada non. Cras aliquet purus dui laoreet diam sed lacus, fames.', icon: SupportIcon, }, { name: 'Tailwind CSS', href: '#', description: 'Varius facilisi mauris sed sit. Non sed et duis dui leo, vulputate id malesuada non. Cras aliquet purus dui laoreet diam sed lacus, fames.', icon: NewspaperIcon, }, ] export default function Project1() { return (
{/* Header */}

React Portfolio

You are looking at it now!

{/* Overlapping cards */}

Contact us

{supportLinks.map((link) => (

{link.name}

{link.description}

))}
) }
